question: Who has been appointed as India's new High Commissioner to South Africa?
explanation: Jaideep Sarkar, a 1987-batch Indian Foreign Service officer, has been appointed as India\'s next High Commissioner to South Africa. He is currently serving as India\'s ambassador in Bhutan and is expected to take up the assignment shortly. He served in Indian Missions in Tokyo, Seoul and Bangladesh as well. The Union government also appointed Suhel Ajaz Khan as next Ambassador to Lebanon.
